attacks.name: Clobber
attacks.special: If a Critical Hit is made, and the target is on a 30 or 40mm base, the target Character becomes Prone.

attacks.name: Big Boot
attacks.special: +2 Power if the target is Prone.

attacks.name: Volley Gun Shot
attacks.special: 16" range. This Attack requires a Hard Feat. Draw a line from the base of the Attacker to the Target. All Characters within 2" of this line are also targeted by this Attack. If there are more Failures than Successes when rolling to Hit, the wielder takes D3 Hits that ignores Armour.
